data.eml:eml: Petroscirtes pylei, a new saber-toothed blenny from the Fiji Islands (Teleostei: Blenniidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article William F. Smith-Vaniz (2005): Petroscirtes pylei, a new saber-toothed blenny from the Fiji Islands (Teleostei: Blenniidae). Zootaxa 1046: 29-36, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:BE5FCD2B-5C72-4B73-ADC9-C1BC67E4739E
